elementSpec.desc: contains letters, words, or phrases inserted in the text by an author, scribe, annotator, or corrector.
文字，単語，句レベルで，著者，筆写者，注釈者，校正 者によるテキストの追加．
contiene cartas, palabras, o frases insertadas en el texto por un autor, escriba, anotador, o corrector.

remarks.p: The add tag should not be used for additions made by editors or encoders. In these cases, either the corr tag or the supplied tag should be used.
